_header: He well will do and do no miss
Subjects: advice; precepts; friends, false; evil living

CamJes59.Transcription:
He weyll wyll do and do no mysffle fro evyll felyschyp qware so euer
                    it ys
CamJes59.Note:
Added to originally blank side of last leaf of MS by a late
                    fifteenth-century hand.
